name: Thermostat User Interface Configuration
description: This cluster provides an interface to allow configuration of the user interface for a thermostat, or a thermostat controller device, that supports a keypad and LCD screen.

data_types.name: KeypadLockoutEnum

values.name: NoLockout
values.summary: All functionality available to the user

values.name: Lockout5
values.summary: Least functionality available to the user

data_types.description: The interpretation of the various levels is device-dependent.

values.name: ScheduleProgrammingPermitted
values.summary: Local schedule programming functionality is enabled at the thermostat

values.name: ScheduleProgrammingDenied
values.summary: Local schedule programming functionality is disabled at the thermostat

attributes.name: TemperatureDisplayMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the units of the temperature displayed on the thermostat screen.

attributes.name: KeypadLockout
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the level of functionality that is available to the user via the keypad.

attributes.name: ScheduleProgrammingVisibility
attributes.description: This attribute is used to hide the weekly schedule programming functionality or menu on a thermostat from a user to prevent local user programming of the weekly schedule.
